ygData.subject: Re: IMPORTANT INFO FOR LVL 20 AND HIGHER (Resistance undone)
ygData.msgSnippet: This could be very well the most important information you will ever here, it will also bring back to man soloing, which for me has relented wonderful exp. One
ygData.messageBody:
This could be very well the most important information you will ever
here, it will also bring back to man soloing, which for me has relented
wonderful exp.

One miseable day in unrest upon reaching 21rst lvl, i grouped with a
party reletive to my lvl and we decided to fight red things, which
means i would probably be useless in casting, but we were brave and
tried anyways. I ended up being resisted 100% of the time.

How many of you really hate that you cant help your friends when this
happens.... Worry no longer, after a long and miserable complaint to
the gms, i was finally reviled why to why this was happeneing... You
see, at higher lvls ,Gm said your spells are extremly valuable to a
party because they way lay final blow to creature.. this means wait
till the thing is hurt in a tanking party... but he said for soloing
you will have no other choice but to enlist the aid of a enchanter... I
responded, you need a enchanter to kill blues?, he said not so much for
blues(although i beg to differ) but he said in the big bright yellow
that at lower lvls we loved to kill for exp in two man teams. I
responded to this , "But why a enchanter?"

WEll folks one simply anwser, which being in mage class, i was extremly
embarressed i had not though of it. A enchanter, you see, posses not
str but, magical influence, ie, they can cast weaken magic reistance
spells on creatures......Are you getting the picture.. so i was
extremely intrested in putting this to work. So i quickly( not really)
looked up the aid of a 21rst lvl enchanter.. however i could not find
one... If any of you have a chance to confirm or deny this method,
please repost this message as i will do so also.

So Enchanter cast weaken resistance, or whatever spell they may have to
do this, Wizards then go to work casting root, blast happy with no
resistance, or at least i hope a much higher success rate.

Happy hunting, Elmara of Povar
